udawalawa jathika udyanaya shri lankawe theth saha wiyali kalapa walata mayimwa pihitayi.thanithala walin bhumiya ghahana athara kandu sahitha bawakda daknata atha.kalthota kandu watiya saha diyawini alla udyanaye uthura desin pihitana athara ee samanga bambaaragala saha reminikotha pihitayi.madhya warshika warshapathanaya mililitar 500 (angal 59) pamana we, wadipurama warshawa adahalenanuye okthombar sita janawari saha marthu sita mayi dakwaya.
